title: Sautéed potatoes with parsley, garlic and lemon

default: salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat, add the potatoes and fry for five minutes, stirring frequently.

Add the garlic and gently fry for one minute. Add the lemon zest and cook for a further 2-3 minutes. Season well with salt and freshly ground black pepper, add the herbs and the juice of half the lemon and stir well.
To serve, place the potatoes into a serving dish. Cut the remaining lemon half into wedges and use to garnish the potatoes.
